TopicTitle: The Sky Palace (121 m by 99 m in size)

Articles.Content:
Here is the largest aircraft ive ever built and also probably one of the biggest ever built in KSP (dont know for sure).

Wasnt really sure if i would put this on to the site (built in 1.0) but tought that why not put it here just for fun since its not gonna hurt anydody.

There is not really much to say about this aircraft so ill let the picks do the talking for me.

And yes, it flyes without the need of cheats but you cant turn with this thing at all since all the force that would go into turning the aircraft goes into flexing the wings.

Mods used: MK-4 fuselage system for engines and QuizTech for the RCS system.

I hope you enjoyed looking at this humongous aircraft built by me cuz i felt like doing something big, really BIG .
I would love to see how that plane handles FAR. I imagine it would have comical results.

why dont you use the big airplane wing for the front of the wing??

;
I think it looks a bit silly plus i like to use swept wings to mark out the outlines of the wings, i think It gives out the nicest looking wing designs.

I think it looks a bit silly plus i like to use swept wings to mark out the outlines of the wings, i think It gives out the nicest looking wing designs.

Maybe if you put big wings underneath the main wing so you can't see them so much but so you still can strut them up and get a much stronger wing?
I guess that might work. Besides im not really that interested to make it fly properly since its super laggy and super impractical.
